displayName: GKE Enterprise Cluster Observability Kubernetes Events

timeSeriesQuery.prometheusQuery:
topk(5, 
    sum by (location, cluster_name) (
        rate(logging_googleapis_com:log_entry_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", severity="ERROR"}[1m])
        or
        rate(logging_googleapis_com:log_entry_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", severity="CRITICAL"}[1m])
        or
        rate(logging_googleapis_com:log_entry_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", severity="ALERT"}[1m])
        or
        rate(logging_googleapis_com:log_entry_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", severity="EMERGENCY"}[1m])
    )
)
